exceptions.exn: In environment T : System extendsPA : Included Formula PA T repT : Formula v0 : nat freeVarRepT : forall v : nat, In v (freeVarFormula LNT repT) -> v = v0 expressT1 : forall f : Formula, mem (fol.Formula LNT) T f -> SysPrf T (substituteFormula LNT repT v0 (natToTerm (codeFormula f))) expressT2 : forall f : Formula, ~ mem (fol.Formula LNT) T f -> SysPrf T (notH (substituteFormula LNT repT v0 (natToTerm (codeFormula f)))) f : fol.Formula LNN H : folProof.SysPrf LNN T' f Unable to unify "exists (Axm : fol.Formulas LNN) (_ : Prf LNN Axm (LNT2LNN_formula ?M1509)), forall g : fol.Formula LNN, In g Axm -> mem (fol.Formula LNN) T' g" with "exists (Axm : fol.Formulas LNT) (_ : Prf LNT Axm (LNN2LNT_formula f)), forall g : fol.Formula LNT, In g Axm -> mem (fol.Formula LNT) T g".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Your Response:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

Your Response:
```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
T: System
extendsPA: Included Formula PA T
repT: Formula
v0: nat
freeVarRepT: forall v : nat, In v (freeVarFormula LNT repT) -> v = v0
expressT1: forall f : Formula, mem (fol.Formula LNT) T f -> SysPrf T (substituteFormula LNT repT v0 (natToTerm (codeFormula f)))
expressT2: forall f : Formula, ~ mem (fol.Formula LNT) T f -> SysPrf T (notH (substituteFormula LNT repT v0 (natToTerm (codeFormula f))))

Goal:
forall f : fol.Formula LNN, folProof.SysPrf LNN T' f -> SysPrf T (LNN2LNT_formula f)

Premises:
Formula = fol.Formula LNT : Set
SysPrf = folProof.SysPrf LNT : fol.System LNT -> fol.Formula LNT -> Prop
PA = Ensembles.Add Formula (Ensembles.Add Formula (Ensembles.Add Formula (Ensembles.Add Formula (Ensembles.Add Formula (Ensembles.Add Formula InductionSchema PA1) PA2) PA3) PA4) PA5) PA6 : Ensemble Formula
LNT = {| Relations := Datatypes.Empty_set; Functions := LNTFunction; arity := LNTArity |} : Language
Module fol := Struct Record Language : Type := language { Relations : Set; Functions : Set; arity : Relations + Functions -> nat } Definition Relations : Language -> Set. Definition Functions : Language -> Set. Definition arity : forall l : Language, Relations l + Functions l -> nat. Inductive Term (L : Language) : Set := var : nat -> Term L | apply : forall f : Functions L, Terms L (arity L (inr f)) -> Term L with Terms (L : Language) : nat -> Set := Tnil : Terms L 0 | Tcons : forall n : nat, Term L -> Terms L n -> Terms L (S n) Definition Term
codeFormula = code.codeFormula LNT codeLNTFunction codeLNTRelation : fol.Formula LNT -> nat
mem : forall U : Type, Ensemble U -> U -> Prop
substituteFormula : forall L : Language, fol.Formula L -> nat -> fol.Term L -> fol.Formula L
notH = fol.notH LNT : fol.Formula LNT -> fol.Formula LNT
LNN2LNT_formula = fix LNN2LNT_formula (f : fol.Formula LNN) : Formula := match f with | @fol.equal _ t1 t2 => equal (LNN2LNT_term t1) (LNN2LNT_term t2) | @atomic _ r ts => match r as l return (fol.Terms LNN (arity LNN (inl l)) -> Formula) with | LT => fun t0 : fol.Terms LNN (arity LNN (inl LT)) => translateLT t0 end ts | @fol.impH _ A B => impH (LNN2LNT_formula
T' = Union (fol.Formula LNN) NN (fun x : fol.Formula LNN => mem (fol.Formula LNT) T (LNN2LNT_formula x)) : fol.System LNN
Module folProof := Struct Definition nVars : forall (L : Language) (n : nat), Terms L n * Terms L n. Definition AxmEq4 : forall L : Language, Relations L -> Formula L. Definition AxmEq5 : forall L : Language, Functions L -> Formula L. Inductive Prf (L : Language) : Formulas L -> Formula L -> Set := AXM : forall A : Formula L, Prf L (A :: nil) A | MP : forall (Axm1 Axm2 : Formulas L) (A B : Formula L), Prf L Axm1 (impH L A B) -> Prf L
In : forall A : Type, A -> list A -> Prop
Included : forall U : Type, Ensemble U -> Ensemble U -> Prop
natToTerm = fix natToTerm (n : nat) : Term := match n with | 0 => Zero | S m => Succ (natToTerm m) end : nat -> Term Arguments natToTerm _%nat_scope
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
freeVarFormula : forall L : Language, fol.Formula L -> list nat
LNN = {| Relations := LNNRelation; Functions := LNTFunction; arity := LNNArity |} : Language
inl : ?A -> ?A + ?B where ?A : [T : System extendsPA : Included Formula PA T repT : Formula v0 : nat freeVarRepT : forall v : nat, In v (freeVarFormula LNT repT) -> v = v0 expressT1 : forall f : Formula, mem (fol.Formula LNT) T f -> SysPrf T (substituteFormula LNT repT v0 (natToTerm (codeFormula f))) expressT2 : forall f : Formula, ~ mem (fol.Formula LNT) T f ->...-> SysPrf T (notH (substituteFormula LNT repT v0 (natToTerm (codeFormula f)))) |- Type]

nil : list ?A where ?A : [T : System extendsPA : Included Formula PA T repT : Formula v0 : nat freeVarRepT : forall v : nat, In v (freeVarFormula LNT repT) -> v = v0 expressT1 : forall f : Formula, mem (fol.Formula LNT) T f -> SysPrf T (substituteFormula LNT repT v0 (natToTerm (codeFormula f))) expressT2 : forall f : Formula, ~ mem (fol.Formula LNT) T f -> SysPrf T (notH (substituteFormula LNT repT v0 (natToTerm (codeFormula f)))) |- Type]

expressT'2 : forall f : Formula, ~ mem (fol.Formula LNT) T f -> folProof.SysPrf LNN T' (fol.notH LNN (substituteFormula LNN (LNT2LNN_formula repT) v0 (natToTermLNN (codeFormula f))))

translatePrf : forall (U : fol.System LNN) (V : System), (forall f : fol.Formula LNN, mem (fol.Formula LNN) U f -> exists Axm : Formulas, (exists _ : Prf LNT Axm (LNN2LNT_formula f), forall g : Formula, In g Axm -> mem (fol.Formula LNT) V g) /\ (forall v : nat, In v (freeVarListFormula LNT Axm) -> In v (freeVarFormula LNN f))) ->...-> exists Axm : Formulas, (exists _ : Prf LNT Axm (LNN2LNT_formula f), forall g : Formula, In g Axm -> mem (fol.Formula LNT) V g) /\ (forall v : nat, In v (freeVarListFormula LNT Axm) -> In v (freeVarListFormula LNN axm))

codeSysPrf.codeSysPrfCorrect1 : forall (L : Language) (codeF : Functions L -> nat) (codeR : Relations L -> nat) (codeArityF codeArityR : nat -> nat) (codeArityFIsPR : primRec.isPR 1 codeArityF), (forall f : Functions L, codeArityF (codeF f) = S (arity L (inr f))) ->...-> LNN.SysPrf T (substituteFormula LNN (substituteFormula LNN (codeSysPrf.codeSysPrf L codeF codeR codeArityF codeArityR codeArityFIsPR codeArityRIsPR fU v0) 0 (LNN.natToTerm (code.codeFormula L codeF codeR f))) 1 (LNN.natToTerm (code.codePrf L codeF codeR A f p)))

translateProof : forall (U : fol.System LNN) (V : System), ClosedSystem LNT V -> (forall f : fol.Formula LNN, mem (fol.Formula LNN) U f -> SysPrf V (LNN2LNT_formula f)) -> forall f : fol.Formula LNN, folProof.SysPrf LNN U f -> SysPrf V (LNN2LNT_formula f)

Axm : forall (T : System) (f : Formula), mem (fol.Formula LNT) T f -> SysPrf T f

Tprf2T'prf : forall f : Formula, SysPrf T f -> folProof.SysPrf LNN T' (LNT2LNN_formula f)

NN2PA : forall f : fol.Formula LNN, folProof.SysPrf LNN NN f -> SysPrf PA (LNN2LNT_formula f)

LNN.Axm : forall (T : LNN.System) (f : LNN.Formula), mem (fol.Formula LNN) T f -> LNN.SysPrf T f
orE : forall (T : System) (f g h : Formula), SysPrf T (orH f g) -> SysPrf T (impH f h) -> SysPrf T (impH g h) -> SysPrf T h
